summary: Fixes problems with cloak spells dispelling atronachs and other summoned creatures because of an error in the flagging system.
descriptionHtml:
This is an extremely simple mod which fixes a minor bug - it fixes instances of cloak spells (Flame, Frost or Lightning cloak) dispelling summoned creatures when cast. This bug might only arise in modded versions of the game but this package shouldn\'t interfere with any other mods. 

My first published mod, all criticism and advice welcome.
author: Tryingtocheerup
